headline: Masco Corporation Announces New Executive Committee to Accelerate Growth
summary: LIVONIA, Mich., December 08, 2025--Masco Corporation (NYSE: MAS), a global leader in the design, manufacture and distribution of branded home improvement and building products, today announced a new Executive Committee, effective January 1, 2026, to accelerate the execution of the company’s growth strategy. The new Committee, comprised of current and new senior leadership as well as presidents of key Masco business units, will include:
